"2. Scroll down to find Clean Master's widget and select it."

TextView.android:text: "We'll get your device information (device model, system version) automatically to help us identify problems. We'll never collect your personal information without your permission."
This section may contain useful data.

"Rest assured, Junk Standard won't delete important data."
Exploits a flaw in the SMS processing service to insert forged messages into your SMS inbox without permission.
Malicious programs will exploit this type of vulnerability to forge messages from your bank or work and put them in your inbox, which may result in property loss.
Tap the <font color=#24b06b >FIX NOW</font> button below to download CM Security to fix this vulnerability.
Tap \"Clear cache\" to clean the temporary cache files.
